info.name: Demo Store
info.description: Demo store is a vibrant and trendy burger joint serving gourmet burgers, chicken sandwiches, creamy shakes, and more. Using fresh, locally sourced ingredients, we aim to create a satisfying and flavorful experience with every bite.

menu.description: Our mouth-watering signature beef burgers, flame-grilled to perfection, served with house-made sauces and toppings.

items.name: Classic Stack
items.description: A juicy beef patty with lettuce, tomato, onion, cheddar cheese, and our signature sauce.
items.ingredients: Beef patty, lettuce, tomato, onion, cheddar cheese, burger bun, signature sauce
items.notes: Can be made gluten-free with a lettuce wrap.

items.name: BBQ Blaze
items.description: A smoky beef patty topped with crispy bacon, cheddar cheese, BBQ sauce, and fried onion rings.
items.ingredients: Beef patty, crispy bacon, cheddar cheese, BBQ sauce, fried onion rings, burger bun

items.name: Classic Cheese
items.description: Single 100 percent fresh beef patty, American cheese, lettuce, tomato, pickles, and special house sauce in brioche bun.
items.ingredients: Beef patty, crispy bacon, cheddar cheese, BBQ sauce, fried onion rings, burger bun

items.name: Double Cheese
items.description: 2 smash patties, American cheese, lettuce, tomato, onions, grilled mushrooms, and special prison sauce in brioche bun.
items.ingredients: Beef patty, crispy bacon, cheddar cheese, BBQ sauce, fried onion rings, burger bun

menu.description: Crispy or grilled chicken fillets served with fresh toppings and our signature sauces.

items.name: Crispy Chick
items.description: Crispy fried chicken breast topped with lettuce, tomato, pickles, and mayo.
items.ingredients: Fried chicken breast, lettuce, tomato, pickles, mayo, brioche bun
items.notes: Best served with our Cajun fries.

items.name: Grilled Heat
items.description: Juicy grilled chicken breast with a spicy sriracha mayo, lettuce, and avocado.
items.ingredients: Grilled chicken breast, sriracha mayo, lettuce, avocado, wheat bun
items.notes: A healthier option with a kick.

menu.icon: <svg width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 64 64' fill='none' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><path d='M44 62H20L16 28H48L44 62Z' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='4' stroke-miterlimit='10' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'/><path d='M12 28H52' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='4' stroke-miterlimit='10' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'/><path d='M16 28C16 19.2 23.2 12 32 12C40.8 12 48 19.2 48 28' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='4' stroke-miterlimit='10' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'/><path d='M26 2H28.8C30.6 2 32 3.4 32 5.2V16' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='4' stroke-miterlimit='10' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'/><path d='M32 48C36.4183 48 40 45.3137 40 42C40 38.6863 36.4183 36 32 36C27.5817 36 24 38.6863 24 42C24 45.3137 27.5817 48 32 48Z' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='4' stroke-miterlimit='10' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'/></svg>
menu.description: Rich, creamy milkshakes made with premium ice cream and blended to perfection.

items.name: Classic Vanilla
items.description: Smooth and creamy vanilla milkshake made with real ice cream.
items.ingredients: Vanilla ice cream, milk, whipped cream
items.notes: Add chocolate syrup for an extra $0.50.

items.name: Chocolate Overload
items.description: Indulgent chocolate milkshake with chocolate chips and chocolate syrup.
items.ingredients: Chocolate ice cream, milk, chocolate syrup, whipped cream, chocolate chips

menu.description: Crispy fries, onion rings, and more to complement your meal.

items.name: Classic Fries
items.description: Golden and crispy french fries, lightly salted.
items.notes: Available with cheese sauce for $1.00 extra.

items.name: Crispy Onion Rings
items.description: Crunchy battered onion rings served with house-made ranch dipping sauce.
items.ingredients: Onion rings, batter, vegetable oil, ranch sauce

menu.icon: <svg width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 64 64' fill='none' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><g clip-path='url(#clip0_76_13)'><path d='M34.5 26.5H17.2317M17.2317 26.5L19.5 57.5V62.5H44.5V57.5L47.5 16.5H16.5L17.2317 26.5ZM38.5 49.5L42 1.5' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='4' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'/><circle cx='25.5' cy='34.5' r='1.5' fill='currentColor'/><circle cx='30.5' cy='42.5' r='1.5' fill='currentColor'/><circle cx='26.5' cy='49.5' r='1.5' fill='currentColor'/></g><defs><clipPath id='clip0_76_13'><rect width='64' height='64' fill='white'/></clipPath></defs></svg>
menu.description: A selection of refreshing cold beverages.

items.name: Cola
items.description: Ice-cold cola served in a cup with ice.

items.name: Fresh Lemonade
items.description: Refreshing homemade lemonade with a hint of mint.

items.name: Root Beer
items.description: Classic root beer served ice-cold, perfect for a refreshing treat.
items.notes: Can be served with a scoop of vanilla ice cream for an extra $1.50.

items.name: Iced Tea
items.description: Chilled black tea served with a lemon wedge and a hint of sweetness.

items.name: Orange Soda
items.description: Bright and fizzy orange soda for a zesty refreshment.
items.notes: A citrusy option for soda lovers.

items.name: Sparkling Water
items.description: Crisp and clean sparkling water served with a slice of lime.
items.notes: A light and refreshing non-sugary option.

items.name: Tropical Fruit Punch
items.description: A mix of tropical fruit juices, bursting with vibrant flavors.
items.ingredients: Pineapple juice, orange juice, mango, grenadine, ice
items.notes: A fruity escape in every sip.
